# Galatea tunnel wrapper for JS.

```js
const Tunnel = require('@testing/galatea-client-js-launcher');

let tunnel = new Tunnel();

tunnel.start({
    tunnelId // tunnel identifier. Defaults to random UUID,
    logFile //Place to write logs to. Defaults to null,
    server //Galatea server endpoint,
    username,
    password,
    timeout, //Tunnel startup timeout, default: 20000,
    args = []
}).then(tunnelId => {
    console.log(tunnelId);
    tunnel.stop();
});
```
